name: Fibre Reinforcement

name: Model to Predict Plastic Shrinkage

name: Prevention of Plastic Shrinkage

name: Waste Prognosis
content: Nithya, R., Senthilkumar, S.R.R., and Velumani, A., “A study on Waste Prognosis based on Socio-Economic indicators using Artificial Neural Network in India”, Proceedings of International Conference and Exhibition on Solid Waste and Environment, “ANSWAI CONF-2009”,  held at Anna University Coimbatore, India, during August 2009.

name: Modelling Elastic Modulus
content: Alfin Ashmita, F., Senthilkumar, S.R.R., Chithra, S., and Chinnaraju, K., “Modelling Elastic Modulus of High Performance Concrete Using Artificial Neural Networks” Presented in  International Conference on Explorations & Innovations in Engineering and Technology ICEIET – 2016 conducted by Hindusthan Institute of Technology, Coimbatore on 18.3.2016 and 19.3.2016.

name: Recycled Coarse Aggregate

name: Application of Eco Sand

name: Fly Ash

name: ABAQUS

name: GIS

name: Nano Silica

name: Machine Learning Algorithm

name: Virtual Reality

name: Educational Institutions

name: copper slag

name: Demolished Concrete
